name: chatroulette-webrtc
description: Chat Roulette app build using Node.js and WebRTC

scripts.bootstrap: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css public/css/bootstrap.min.css & cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js public/js/bootstrap.min.js & cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/js/jquery.min.js
